title: Crafts of My Province
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Peter Jones, Douglas Jackson and Kirk Jones
brief_description: A film visit to New Brunswick craftsmen, such as the potters Kjeld and Erica Deichmann of Sussex, N.B., who demonstrate all stages, from potter’s wheel to kiln. Shown also are the hand-looming of woolens and the designing of jewelry from local stones and silver.
